item.title: Healthcare Problems and Solutions
item.description: Problem: Limited Supply of Healthcare Resources Ignorance The general problem of ignorance in healthcare demands the general solution of sensemaking in healthcare. COVID-19 People report the COVID-19 pandemic leads to hospitals being overcrowded with COVID-19 patients which strains the healthcare system. Short-term Solution: Allow Assisted Suicides A better choice of words would be “improved hospice services” instead of “allow assisted suicides”. People responded in a predictable way to my suggestion that assisted suicides would improve our healthcare system.
